name: r/Bossfight The game
description:
This game is super wierd, sort of broken, but pretty funny (for genZ at least).

It is pretty much one big Meme, made in RPG maker Mv because I am way to lazy to learn programming. Please just enjoy my "first" game on Itch.io

If you wanna see shitposts then here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNrvoMyriyCeMDfR6pAKjVQ

Bye

Ps: Maybe I´ll add a few chapters if I want to, but.... Shush...We don´t wanna alarm Spilltea...
